ygData.subject: Re: prices for enchanting metal
ygData.msgSnippet: I usually charge 3-5g per silver bar and 1p per electrum bar, since it takes so much mana for enchanting metals. Loreweaver ... From: DeGirolami, Franck
ygData.messageBody:
I usually charge 3-5g per silver bar and 1p per electrum bar, since it takes
so much mana for enchanting metals.

Loreweaver

-----Original Message-----
From: DeGirolami, Franck <degirolami@...>
To: Eqenchanters (E-mail) <eqenchanters@onelist.com>
Date: Monday, May 10, 1999 1:45 PM
Subject: [eqenchanters] prices for enchanting metal


>From: "DeGirolami, Franck" <degirolami@...>
>
>I've been enchanting silver for a bunch of fellow jewelers. I've charged
>from 1 to 2 gold a piece so far.
>What do you guys charge? What about for electrum?
>Skara
>
